Video: The Children ' s Hospital of Gnestoshko attended the holiday

Culture♪7 hours ago.

At the Russ Oldina Museum for the children ' s home of Gnzeyshko, as well as for the children of the evening school, a celebration took place in these popular traditions. For the reason of the recent baptism. The kids not only taught the prams and generosities, but they also showed unique collections.

Under Smolenski, funds will be allocated for the development of a clean-up project in Hislavica

Society♪7 hours ago.

The Government of the Smole region has approved a request for 5 million roubles for the development of design and design documents for the construction of the treatment plants at the Hislavichi site. This was reported by the head of the Sergei Shapkin area.

Video: In what state of the shelters in the basements of urban multi-sets

Cases♪7 hours ago.

The entrance to the basement contains an information plate containing a person ' s telephone number, which stores the key and opens the cover if necessary. Together with representatives of the GO and CC Office, we have decided to verify whether the data are relevant on the plate and how quickly the key will be delivered.

To share the news.

Video: In Smolenske, GIBD inspectors detected more than 100 irregularities during the Drifters hunt.

Society♪7 hours ago.

Over the past week, some 150 irregularities were identified by the State Inspection in the parking area near the Maxi shopping centre. They traveled to raids at night just when the drifters were activated.

To share the news.
